description: We love that neat little "pull to refresh" feature on our devices, but wouldn't it be awesome if it was for the web? Well, that's what Hook is here to do. We took a concept from mobile phones and tablets and made it work for the web. Try it out: Simply scroll down a bit, and then back up to the top. Bam! You've just Hooked for the first time on the web.
name: Hook.js
